## Frontend
#### Github secrets needed
- `EC2_FRONTEND_SSH_KEY`
- `EC2_FRONTEND_HOST`
- `EC2_FRONTEND_USERNAME`


## Backend
#### Github secrets needed
- `EC2_BACKEND_SSH_KEY`
- `EC2_BACKEND_HOST`
- `EC2_BACKEND_USERNAME`


## Terraform
#### Github secrets needed
- `AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID`
- `AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY`
#### Github variables needed
- `AWS_REGION`
